translations: [内科] 心电图仪，[内科] 心电图描记器

sentences.sentence: You need to do an ECG (electrocardiograph).
It accord with demand of digital electrocardiograph.
sentences.translation: 满足了数字化心电图机的需要。

sentences.sentence: Especially, 12 channels electrocardiograph has played an important role in clinic.
sentences.translation: 尤其是12导心电图机，在临床上具有重要的意义。
